title: Nintendo GameBoy Emulator
description: This is an emulator of Nintendo's original GameBoy handheld console. This project also allowed me to practice development of a large C++ project through proper project structure and test-driven development. The source code is covered by unit tests written using Google Test.

title: Procedural Terrain Generator
description: This is a Procedural Terrain Generator for use in Unity projects. Using random noise algorithms, physics simulation, random object placement, custom materials, textures, and colours an endless variety of worlds can be created using this tool.
